tool_description: Evaluates geological sites for survey feasibility, terrain accessibility, and resource potential based on coordinates and survey objectives.

survey_type.description: Type of geological survey: mineral, petroleum, groundwater, geotechnical

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Unsupported survey type: Use one of [mineral, petroleum, groundwater, geotechnical].
Inaccessible location: Site may be in restricted or hazardous area.
usage: Provide site coordinates and survey type to assess site suitability, accessibility, and potential hazards.
